channel.title: Hacker My Music Homepage
channel.description: Recent content on Hacker My Music Homepage

item.description: Welcome to BAND CAMP! AKA Hacker My Music! NOTE: This is all CONTINGENT on us getting accepted to DEF CON. Welcome to “Band Camp”, also known as “Hacker My Music!”, “Maker My Music!”, and “Pitch Imperfect”. This event is all about creating and showcasing unique musical instruments and melodies. Join us for a fun and creative experience where originality and innovation are key! Submit your hacker tunes and musical tools by recording in our pop-up sound booth or make something unique and reproducible ahead of time and submit on-site!
